content: Hello sir, do you need your ducts cleaned right now? Amazing deal, message me back!
Thank you for reaching out to XYZ, your trusted home service provider. How can I assist you with plumbing, electrical, or HVAC needs today?
Special offer! Message STOP to end. Book duct cleaning now & get 2 for 1. Reply YES to claim.
We only process requests for plumbing, electrical, and HVAC services at XYZ. If you need assistance with one of those, please let us know.
reason: Detected spam solicitation, not a genuine service inquiry.
